title: ⛳️ "You should celebrate who you are." - Eva Mendes
content:
(thanks Tom!): If you mix up the order of letters in a word, many people can slitl raed and urenadnstd tehm. Write a function that takes an input sentence, and mixes up the insides of words (anything longer than 3 letters).

Example:

> scramble(["A quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog."])
> "A qciuk bwron fox jmepud oevr the lzay dog."
